skill.name: pdf
skill.description: Comprehensive PDF manipulation toolkit for extracting text and tables, creating new PDFs, merging/splitting documents, and handling forms. When Claude needs to fill in a PDF form or programmatically process, generate, or analyze PDF documents at scale.
skill.summary: Comprehensive PDF manipulation toolkit for extracting text and tables, creating new PDFs, merging/sp...
skill.author: Anthropic

security_audit.summary: Official Anthropic skill with predefined scripts for PDF processing and form handling. Minimal audit performed per policy with no security issues identified.

content.value_statement: You need to extract content or fill PDF forms reliably. This skill provides scripts and guidance for PDF text, tables, images, and form workflows.
actual_capabilities: Detect whether a PDF has fillable form fields
Extract fillable field metadata and page locations
Convert PDF pages to PNG images with resizing
Fill fillable PDF fields with validated values
Create validation images and check bounding boxes
Add text annotations for non-fillable PDF forms
limitations: Requires local Python dependencies like pypdf, pdf2image, and Pillow
Non-fillable forms require manual bounding box analysis
No built-in OCR for scanned PDFs without external tools

use_cases.title: Fill onboarding forms
use_cases.description: Populate standard employee forms with validated field IDs and values.

use_cases.title: Validate form layouts
use_cases.description: Generate bounding box checks and validation images before annotating PDFs.

use_cases.title: Batch PDF conversion
use_cases.description: Convert multi page PDFs into PNG images for downstream analysis.

prompt_templates.title: Check form fields
prompt_templates.scenario: Determine if a PDF has fillable fields
prompt_templates.prompt: Check whether this PDF has fillable form fields and tell me the next step to fill it.

prompt_templates.title: Extract field info
prompt_templates.scenario: List fields and pages for a fillable form
prompt_templates.prompt: Extract field IDs, types, and pages from the PDF so I can map values to fields.

prompt_templates.title: Prepare non fillable
prompt_templates.scenario: Create validation images for bounding boxes
prompt_templates.prompt: Convert the PDF pages to images and help me prepare fields.json and validation images for manual entry areas.

prompt_templates.title: Fill with annotations
prompt_templates.scenario: Write text into a non fillable PDF
prompt_templates.prompt: Use fields.json to add text annotations to the PDF and generate the filled output file.

output_examples.input: Fill this PDF form with the provided field values and save a new file.
output: Validated field IDs and values against form metadata

best_practices: Run field extraction before preparing values
Validate bounding boxes with images and automated checks
Keep field values aligned to correct page numbers
anti_patterns: Skipping field validation and writing values directly
Using entry boxes that overlap label text
Assuming scanned PDFs are fillable without checks

faq.question: Is this compatible with all PDFs?
faq.answer: It supports standard fillable forms and image based workflows, but some complex PDFs may need manual adjustment.

faq.question: What are the file size or page limits?
faq.answer: Limits depend on local memory and tools like pdf2image; large files may need page batching.

faq.question: Can I integrate it in a pipeline?
faq.answer: Yes, the scripts can be called from automation or wrapped in other tooling.

faq.question: How is my data handled?
faq.answer: Processing occurs locally with scripts and does not require network access.

faq.question: What if fields do not show up?
faq.answer: Run the fillable field check and switch to the non fillable workflow if no fields are detected.

faq.question: How does this compare to generic PDF tools?
faq.answer: It provides guided, scriptable steps for forms and validation rather than only manual GUI editing.
